divs: Sighting DetailsWell I saw this same star like object on January2009 and figuered maybe it was a bright star but then I saw it agian tonight around the same time 5:20pm having a smoke on my patio when I looked to the same spot I saw this bright star like object agian.It was weird cause you can see the moon and airplanes flying high above this starlike brightness over and under the object.It would slightly move left to right and then pause and sit their like a star but you could see it have like a pulse twinkly to it brighter then softer and repeated.I watched this object for 2hrs it just would move slightly and then sit their.I decide to see if this thing would react to a flash light to see if I could get it to move.So I move my flash light as I was shining it in the direction of this Star like object and did a V shape movement and latter after it slowly imiated it in the sky very slowly.During this whole time You could her aipplanes flying by but this object didn't seem to make a sound.I'm kinda amazed and curious as to what it was because it definately was not a helicopter cause it had no runing lights or sound comeing from it and all the jet liners you could see their beacon lights on them.
Summary: Star Like but way brighter than any other star in the sky and plus it was pulsing
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Aliso Viejo
There were no other sightings in Aliso Viejo on or around January 4th 2009
